item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL bytes received per second
item.description:
The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL bytes sent per second
item.description:
The number of bytes sent to all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL begin operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL commit operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL delete operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL insert operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL rollback operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL select operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL update operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL queries per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.version, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

template.name: DB_MySQL_Replication
template.description: MySQL数据库做主从同步，特点是异步复制

item.name: GPU file - glusterfs.directory
item.description: /mnt/glusterfs/gpu_cluster/run_data/users目录为空或该目录中用户目录总数小于40

item.name: Process Glusterfs memory usage
item.description: 进程/usr/sbin/glusterfs的内存使用率

/opt/hdfs is empty directory

item_prototype.name: Innodb Sem Wait Time Ms on $1
item_prototype.description: MySQL Innodb Sem Wait Time Ms

item_prototype.name: State Copying To Tmp Table on $1
item_prototype.description: MySQL State Copying To Tmp Table

trigger_prototype.expression: {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.Threads-running[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}<100 and {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.Threads-running[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}>40
trigger_prototype.name: MySQL {#MYSQLPORT} active threads more than 40 on {HOST.NAME}
MySQL {#MYSQLPORT} active threads more than 100 on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.Threads-connected[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}/{Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.max-connections[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}>0.8 and {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.Threads-connected[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}/{Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.max-connections[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}<0.95
trigger_prototype.name: MySQL {#MYSQLPORT} connections utilization more than 80% on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.Threads-connected[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}/{Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.max-connections[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}>0.95
trigger_prototype.name: MySQL {#MYSQLPORT} connections utilization more than 95% on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.slave-lag[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}>300 and {Percona MySQL Server Multiport Template:MySQL.slave-lag[{#MYSQLPORT}].last(0)}<600
trigger_prototype.name: MySQL{#MYSQLPORT} slave lag more than 300 on {HOST.NAME}
MySQL{#MYSQLPORT} slave lag more than 600 on {HOST.NAME}

graph_prototype.name: InnoDB Internal Hash Memory Usage on {#MYSQLPORT}
